Class SceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • SceneController
  • public class SceneController
extends java.lang.Object
    A Controller class used for FXML files and any kind of methods associated with it

      • randomPacMan

        public void randomPacMan()
        Method for random choosing of a color and headgear for the pacman. In case if the color or headgear matches with the color or headgear in the main class, the method calls itself to randomly generate another random color and headgear

      • setName

        public void setName()
        Gets the name from the text field and sets it to the main class and starts the multiplayer game

        ois - - ObjectInputStream

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage()
        Gets the message from the TextField and creates a new class which contains the name and the chat message to be sent to the server.
